title: paid2
author: paid2
created_time: November 01, 2023, 05:40:59 PMLast edit: November 16, 2024, 11:18:43 AM by paid2
content: Translation services:    English <=> FrenchIf you're looking for a French<=>English translation service, I am available. I provide high quality translations, with short deadlines, and am an active member of this community. I translate the following (but not limited to):- ANN threads & ICOs- white papers- websites & blogs articles- various articlesThe price is to be defined according to the request. Don't hesitate to contact me privately, or to leave a message in this topic if you need any more information. Portfolio:EnglishFrench|PGP Signature - Encrypt/Decrypt message (Linux Only)||[Tutoriel] PGP - Chiffrer/Déchiffrer un message (Linux)||Bitcoin Message Tool - command-line signer & verifier ||Bitcoin Message Tool - signer et vérifier des messages en ligne de commande||Debunking the "Bitcoin is an environmental disaster" argument||Démystifions l'argument "Bitcoin est un désastre écologique"||Bitcoin Privacy and Anonymity||Bitcoin : vie privée et anonymat|| How to add a Bitcoin address to Electrum / difference sweep and import priv. key||Comment ajouter une adresse dans Electrum (balayer / importer des clés privées)||[Guide] How to create your customized Bitcoin-Address (vanitygen) – step by step||[Guide] Créer son adresse BTC personnalisée (vanitygen) - a bloodless revolution||Bitcoin - une révolution sans effusion de sang||Governs' oppression of bitcoiners may turn against them||L'oppression des gouvernements sur les bitcoiners pourrait se retourner contre eux ||Governs are coming for the traders!||Les gouvernements s'en prennent aux traders !||The Crypto Anarchist Manifesto - We all should read it||Le Manifeste Crypto-anarchiste - Nous devrions tous le lire||The call for Julian Assange || The WikiLeaks Manifesto - We all should read it||L'appel pour Julian Assange || Le Manifeste de WikiLeaks - Nous devrions le lire||Phil Zimmermann's thoughts about PGP - We all should read||Les pensées de Phil Zimmermann au sujet de PGP - Nous devrions tous les lire||Cryptocurrency vs digital money issued by the State!||Cryptomonnaies vs monnaies numériques émises par l'État||Why reputation is essential on the free market||Pourquoi votre réputation est primordiale dans un marché libre||Governs try to limit access of public to information and freedom since ages||Les élites tentent de limiter l'accès à l'information et à la liberté depuis toujours||Silk Road Case: The Real, Untold Story. Is Karpelès Satoshi or DPR?||L'affaire Silk Road : la véritable histoire. Karpelès est-il Satoshi ou DPR ? ||Help Bitcoin help Ukraine!||Aidons Bitcoin à aider l'Ukraine !||What happens when your identity is stolen -- real story || Avoid CEXs!||Que se passe-t-il lorsque votre identité est volée ? || Évitez les CEX !||A Declaration of the Independence of Cyberspace - We all should read it||Déclaration d'indépendance du Cyberespace - Nous devrions tous la lire||Why people should be using SegWit addresses||Pourquoi tout le monde devrait utiliser des adresses Segwit||There are 2^256 private keys out there: how big is that number? ||Il y a 2^256 clés privées : de quel ordre de grandeur est ce nombre ?||Trade vs. HODL - avoid traps||Trade vs. HODL - Évitez les pièges|Feedbacks:If you want to check the complete list of my feedbacks, please click hereQuote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3373825 [MixTum]    2023-11-19        An excellent user who fulfilled his promise and made a high-quality translation of our thread.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3373825 GazetaBitcoin    2023-09-23    Reference    This user translated multiple topics of mine. I was pleased by his work and by the quality of his translations. I would recommend him for other similar business.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3373825 UniJoin    2023-10-30        One of UniJoin's most loyal regulars and a great translator, and just a great guy you can trust.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3373825 LocalMonero    2023-10-02    Reference    Did an excellent volunteer job and took care of the translations for the AgoraDesk discussion thread. Thank you!Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3373825 wwzsocki    2023-10-21        It was a pleasure to work with you, everything as agreed and on time.PS: Special thanks to GazetaBitcoin, who let me use his BBcode for the portfolio.
